segment.source: This operations section includes information about the various types of Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) administration and operating tasks that are typically performed by an administrator.
segment.target: This operations section includes information about the various types of Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) administration and operating tasks that are typically performed by an administrator.

segment.source: This section also includes step-by-step procedures to help you successfully perform these tasks.
segment.target: This section also includes step-by-step procedures to help you successfully perform these tasks.

segment.source: This topic provides instructions for how to restore user settings, change synchronization frequency, and configure UE-V settings.
segment.target: This topic provides instructions for how to restore user settings, change synchronization frequency, and configure UE-V settings.

segment.source: Working with Custom UE-V Templates and the UE-V Generator
segment.target: Working with Custom UE-V Templates and the UE-V Generator

segment.source: This topic provides instructions for how to use the UE-V Generator and manage custom settings location templates.
segment.target: This topic provides instructions for how to use the UE-V Generator and manage custom settings location templates.

segment.source: Administering UE-V with PowerShell and WMI
segment.target: Administering UE-V with PowerShell and WMI

segment.source: Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) provides Windows PowerShell cmdlets which can help administrators perform various UE-V tasks.
segment.target: Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) provides Windows PowerShell cmdlets which can help administrators perform various UE-V tasks.

segment.source: This topic covers general security considerations for UE-V and the UE-V privacy statement.
segment.target: This topic covers general security considerations for UE-V and the UE-V privacy statement.

segment.source: Getting Started With User Experience Virtualization 1.0
segment.target: Getting Started With User Experience Virtualization 1.0
